speak;Ephraim;The eastern perimeter seems secure.|We should check the western wall next.|Stay alert, Tana.

bop_portrait;Tana
expression;Tana;Smile

speak;Ephraim;Indeed.|Good visibility is crucial for night watch.|We'll be able to spot any movement from quite a distance.
expression;Tana;NoSmile
speak;Tana;Oh...|That's not exactly what I meant.
speak;Ephraim;Is something wrong with your pegasus?|You seem distracted.
expression;Tana;NormalBlink
speak;Tana;No, it's just...|It's rare that we get time alone like this.|Don't you think it's... nice?
speak;Ephraim;Having a skilled pegasus knight on patrol is certainly advantageous.|Your aerial view complements my ground surveillance.
expression;Tana;NoSmile
speak;Tana;(Is he really this dense?);;;thought_bubble
speak;Tana;Ephraim, when was the last time you ate a proper meal?
speak;Ephraim;This morning, I believe.|Why do you ask?
expression;Tana;Smile
speak;Tana;It's just that...|I packed some food.|I thought we might have a little...picnic while on watch.
speak;Ephraim;A picnic?|During guard duty?|That seems rather...irregular.
speak;Tana;Not a full picnic, just...|A small meal together.|Under the stars.
speak;Ephraim;I appreciate the thought, Tana, but we must remain vigilant.|Perhaps we could eat in shifts?|I'll take first watch while you eat.
expression;Tana;HalfCloseEyes
speak;Tana;That's not...|That's not what I had in mind.
speak;Ephraim;Is something wrong with my suggestion?
speak;Tana;Ephraim, do you know why I volunteered for night patrol with you?
speak;Ephraim;Because you take your duties seriously.|As a princess of Frelia, your commitment to our cause is admirable.
bop_portrait;Tana
speak;Tana;That's not why I volunteered!|Don't you get it?|I wanted to spend time with you!
speak;Ephraim;We are spending time together.|Right now, on patrol.
bop_portrait;Tana
speak;Tana;Not like this!|Not just talking about patrol routes and enemy movements!|I meant... spending time together... personally.
speak;Ephraim;Personally?|I'm not sure I understand what you mean, Tana.
expression;Tana;NoSmile
speak;Tana;I'm talking about us!|You and me!|Don't you ever think about...anything beyond the war?
speak;Ephraim;Of course I do.|I think about rebuilding Renais.|Restoring our kingdom to its former glory.
speak;Tana;And what about your personal life?|Your future?|Don't you think about that?
speak;Ephraim;My personal considerations must come second to my duties.|Until this war is won, I cannot afford distractions.
expression;Tana;HalfCloseEyes
speak;Tana;Distractions?|Is that what you think I am?|A distraction?
speak;Ephraim;That's not what I said, Tana.
expression;Tana;CloseEyes
speak;Tana;But it's what you meant!|You're so...so...oblivious!
expression;Ephraim;HalfCloseEyes
speak;Ephraim;Tana, I think there's been a misunderstanding.|I value your friendship and your contribution to our cause.
speak;Tana;Friendship...|Of course.|That's all it is to you, isn't it?
speak;Ephraim;Is there something else I should be aware of?
bop_portrait;Tana
speak;Tana;I've had enough of this!|If you can't figure it out on your own, then I'm not going to explain it to you!
speak;Ephraim;Tana, wait!|What about our patrol?
speak;Tana;Finish it yourself!|Clearly, your "duty" is more important than anything else!
bop_portrait;Ephraim
expression;Ephraim;NoSmile
speak;Ephraim;Tana!|Where are you going?|We haven't checked the western wall!

speak;Seth;Prince Ephraim?|Is everything alright?|I heard raised voices.
speak;Ephraim;Seth...|I think Princess Tana is upset with me.|But I'm not entirely sure why.
speak;Seth;Ah...|I see.
bop_portrait;Ephraim
speak;Ephraim;What do you see?|She was talking about having a picnic during guard duty.|Then she got angry when I suggested we eat in shifts.
speak;Seth;My lord, if I may speak freely...|I believe Princess Tana may have had...different expectations for your time together.
speak;Ephraim;Different expectations?|What do you mean?
speak;Seth;Sometimes, my lord, guard duty can be more than just guard duty.|Especially under a full moon, with shared food...
speak;Ephraim;Wait...|Are you suggesting that Tana thought this was...|Oh no.
speak;Seth;I believe she may have been attempting to create a...romantic setting, my lord.
expression;Ephraim;HalfCloseEyes
speak;Ephraim;But I never...|I didn't intend to...|I've made a terrible mistake, haven't I?
expression;Seth;Smile
speak;Seth;It's not irreparable, Prince Ephraim.|Princess Tana is understanding.|But perhaps an apology is in order.
speak;Ephraim;Yes, you're right.|Thank you, Seth.|I'll speak with her first thing tomorrow.
expression;Seth;NoSmile
speak;Seth;Very good, my lord.|Shall I take over the remainder of your watch?|So you can...prepare what you'll say?
expression;Ephraim;NormalBlink

speak;Seth;As you wish, my lord.|And if I may offer one piece of advice...
speak;Ephraim;Please do.
speak;Seth;Sometimes, even in war...|It's worth making time for matters of the heart.|Even the greatest leaders need something to fight for.
remove_portrait;Seth
speak;Ephraim;Matters of the heart...|How did I miss something so obvious?|Tana, I'm sorry...
